article.titre: Probabilistic Sentence Reduction Using Support Vector Machines
article.auteur: Minh Le Nguyen, Akira Shimazu, Susumu Horiguchi Bao Tu Ho and Masaru Fukushi Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology 1-8, Tatsunokuchi, Ishikawa, 923-1211, JAPAN {nguyenml, shimazu, hori, bao, mfukushi}@jaist.ac.jp
article.abstract: This paper investigates a novel application of sup- port vector machines (SVMs) for sentence reduction. We also propose a new probabilistic sentence reduc- tion method based on support vector machine learn- ing. Experimental results show that the proposed methods outperform earlier methods in term of sen- tence reduction performance.
